reported by jerichopumpkin: http://www.slightlymagic.net/forum/viewtopic.php?f=82&t=15630#p163610 MiniMax likes to Graft opponents creatures.

author: [ShawnieBoyUK](https://code.google.com/u/ShawnieBoyUK/)
title: Some AI prefer to Graft opponents creatures
content:
_From [ShawnieBoyUK](https://code.google.com/u/ShawnieBoyUK/) on October 10, 2014 20:54:38_

reported by jerichopumpkin: http://www.slightlymagic.net/forum/viewtopic.php?f=82&t=15630#p163610 MiniMax likes to Graft opponents creatures.

A blanket solution could be only allowing the AI to graft it's own creatures.
